election_record.label: New Hampshire 1811 Governor

overview.note: "The votes from Dunbarton, Kearsage Gore, New Ipswich, Litchfield, Conway, Landaff, Peeling and Stratford, not having sufficient evidence that legal meetings were chosen, and in other respects informal, were submitted for the rejection of the house. In these towns the votes were for Mr. Langdon 355, Mr. Smith 409 and five scattering. The report was accepted." The Columbian (New York, NY). June 21, 1811.

sub_unit.name: Dublin
sub_unit.note: The votes from Dublin were rejected.
